name: gpt-codex-proxy
description: Cloudflare Worker proxy for Codex responses using ChatGPT OAuth tokens

secrets.name: OPENAI_ACCESS_TOKEN
secrets.description: Access token from OAuth login (run: node scripts/oauth-login.js)

secrets.name: PROXY_SECRET
secrets.description: Secret key used by your clients to call this proxy

secrets.name: CHATGPT_ACCOUNT_ID
secrets.description: Optional ChatGPT account/org id for subscription routing
